title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 700.5 - Initiation of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 700.5 - Initiation of hearing

State Regulations

Upon receipt of a grantee's written request for a hearing
under section
700.4
of this Part, the hearing
officer unit of the department shall schedule the hearing and notify the
grantee of the date, time, and place for the hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
700.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
